review: Buying this might be the best thing I've done in years!  When I have tried to get some work done in the car before having this I would have to twist myself around and still couldn't see the screen very well.  Now, using the hotspot on my phone for wi-fi I can work no matter where I am.  It's made a real difference in how much I can get done during the day.  This attaches perfectly to my steering wheel and holds up my 15.6" laptop with no problems at all.  I LOVE it!
productTitle: Cutequeen Trading car 1pcs Eating/Laptop Steering Wheel Desk Black(pack of 1)
